term-of-service-content:
Terms of Service:

  1. Terms of Service Acceptance: By using DocTransGPT, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to any part of these terms, do not use our services.
  2. User Accounts: To access certain features of our website, you may be required to create a user account. You agree to the confidentiality of your account credentials. and you are solely responsible for all activities that occur under your account.
  3. Payment and Tokens: Our translation service works on a token-based system.The number of tokens required for translation is determined by the OpenAI Tokenizer algorithm and is accurately counted based on the text or document you enter.When your token balance runs out, you will need to recharge your account with tokens.Payments can be made using PayPal or credit card.
  4. Services Use: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes.You shall not upload, transmit, or store any content that is illegal, harmful, defamatory, or infringes the rights of others.You are solely responsible for any content you submit for translation.
  5. Intellectual Property: All content and materials available on our website, including text, graphics, logos, and software, are owned by DocTransGPT and are protected by intellectual property.Laws, written prior written notice. You may not reproduce, modify, distribute, or create derivative works of the Content without permission.
  6. Limitation of Liability: DocTransGPT shall in no event be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special or otherwise consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our services.We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness or availability of the services and make no warranties, express or implied, regarding their use or results. .
  7. Termination: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account and access. You can always access our services for any reason or no reason. Upon termination, your account and associated data will be deleted, except for information we are required to retain for legal or accounting purposes.
  8. Governing Law: These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the following laws. The laws of Japan will govern without regard to its conflict of law principles. Any disputes arising out of or in connection with these Terms and the use of our services shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in Japan.
privacy-policy-content:
At DocTransGPT, we respect your privacy and are committed to the security of your personal information. This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect the information you provide when you use our translation services. By using our website, you consent to the practices described in this policy.

  1. Information we collect: When you create an account on our website. Once created, certain personal information will be collected, including your email address and complete information.Name.This information is used to provide you access to our services, to communicate with you regarding your account, and to send you important updates or changes to our services.In addition, when using the document translation feature, uploaded files are temporarily stored for translation purposes.Once the translation process is complete, uploaded files are promptly deleted.A translation history is also stored for statistical analysis and service improvement purposes. .
  2. Token Calculation: For accurate billing, the number of tokens used for translation is determined using the OpenAI Tokenizer algorithm, which ensures an accurate count based on: The text or document entered.The cost of the translation is calculated based on the total number of tokens used.
  3. Payment & Security: To facilitate payment for our services, we offer the option of using PayPal or a credit card.Credit card information is stored on our servers. Nothing is stored.All payment transactions are securely handled by our trusted third-party payment service providers and in accordance with their respective privacy and security policies.
  4. Email notification and document access: Once your document translation is complete, you will receive an email notification with: The download URL for the translated document, which will allow you to securely access and retrieve the translated file.For your convenience, please note that the download link remains active for the specified period of time.
  5. Data Security: We employ industry standard measures to protect your personal information and uploaded documents from unauthorized access, disclosure or alteration. , and destruction. Please note that while we strive to maintain the highest levels of security, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is completely secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee absolute security.
  6. Third-Party Services: We may use third-party services, such as analytics providers, to improve our Services and analyze usage patterns. These services may collect information about your usage, but do not have access to your personal information.
  7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies: Our website uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your experience and analyze website usage. These technologies may collect information such as your IP address, browser type, operating system and browsing behavior. You have the option to disable cookies through your browser settings, but please note that as a result some features of our website may not function properly.
  8. Third Party Links: Our website may contain links to third parties. website. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of those websites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third party sites you visit.
  9. Children's Privacy: Our Services are not directed to individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect information or store personal information from anyone under the age of 18. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected personal information from a child under the age of 18, we will take steps to remove that information from our records.
  10. Updates to our Privacy Policy: We may periodically update our Privacy Policy to reflect changes in practice or legal requirements. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting the revised policy on our website. We encourage you to periodically review this Privacy Policy for the latest information.

You can translate up to 500 characters w: You can translate up to 500 characters with the free version of DOCTRANSGPT. Sign up for free to translate up to 5000 characters at a time.

please check your mailbox to activate yo: Please check your mailbox to activate your account.
Your tokens are not enough for next tran: Your tokens are not enough for next translation. Please add more tokens.
Please verify your account. If you did n: Please verify your account. If you did not receive the verification email, please click the button below to resend the verification email.
How does the document translation featur: How does the document translation feature work?
To translate a document, you need to upl: To translate a document, you need to upload the file to our website. Once uploaded, our system securely processes the document and provides you with the translated version. Your uploaded files are promptly deleted from our servers after the translation is completed.
Yes, we prioritize the security of your: Yes, we prioritize the security of your payment information. We do not store any credit card information on our servers. All payment transactions are securely processed by trusted third-party payment service providers, adhering to their respective privacy and security policies.
Can I change my email address?: Can I change my email address?
No, you cannot change your email address: No, you cannot change your email address once your account has been created. This policy ensures the security and integrity of your account information. However, you can update your full name and password within your account settings.
How do you protect my personal informati: How do you protect my personal information and uploaded documents?
We take the security of your personal in: We take the security of your personal information and uploaded documents seriously. We employ industry-standard measures to protect them from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction. However, please be aware that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee absolute security.
How is the cost of translation calculate: How is the cost of translation calculated?
Our translation cost is calculated based: Our translation cost is calculated based on the number of tokens used, with each token determined by the OpenAI tokenizer algorithm.
Will I receive an email when the documen: Will I receive an email when the document translation is completed?
Yes, upon completion of the document tra: Yes, upon completion of the document translation process, you will receive an email notification containing the download URL for the translated document. This allows you to securely access and retrieve the translated file. The download link will remain active for a specified period of time for your convenience.
